revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: {{also|xx|x_x|X_X}} ==Translingual== ===Etymology 1=== ====Numeral==== {{head|mul|numeral}} # A Roman numeral representing the number [[20]]. =====Alternative forms===== * {{l|mul|xx}}, {{l|mul|XVV}}, {{l|mul|xvv}} =====See also===== * Previous: [[XIX]]. Next: [[XXI]] ===Etymology 2=== From [[X chromosome]]. ====Adjective==== {{head|mul|adjective}} # {{lb|mul|biology}} Having a [[female]] configuration of [[chromosome]]s as per the [[XY system]]. #* {{quote-text|en|termlang=mul|year=2001|author=Kenneth L. Becker (ed)|title=Principles and Practice of Endocrinology and Metabolism|page=857|isbn=0781717507|passage=An autosomal recessive gene causes gonadal dysgenesis in '''XX''' individuals, and several distinct entities have been identified.}} #* {{quote-text|en|termlang=mul|year=2007|author=Fima Lifshitz (ed)|title=Pediatric Endocrinology, Volume 2|page=358|isbn=1420055232|passage=If a Y chromosome is present in an '''XX'''-karyotyped individual, gonadal removal is necessary due to the risk of gonadoblastoma.}} #* {{quote-text|en|termlang=mul|year=2009|author=Gerald N. Callahan|title=Between XX and XY: Intersexuality and the Myth of Two Sexes|page=30|isbn=1556527853|passage=The group at John Hopkins{{sic}}, as well as many others, dropped the "true sex" policy (such as '''XX''' or XY) and adopted the "optimal gender" policy for assigning sex to sexually ambiguous children.}} # {{lb|mul|biology}} {{synonym of|mul|ZZ||having a male configuration of chromosomes as per the ZW system}} =====Antonyms===== * {{l|mul|XY}} =====Derived terms===== * [[XX male syndrome]] =====See also===== * [[ZZ]], [[ZW]] ===Etymology 3=== ====Adjective==== {{head|mul|adjective}} # {{lb|mul|clothing}} Extra large, a garment size =====Synonyms===== * [[XL]] [[Category:Roman numerals]] {{topics|mul|Twenty}} ---- ==Korean== ===Etymology=== From {{der|ko|ja|-}} [[××#Japanese|{{lj|[×](ばつ)[×](ばつ)}}]]. ===Noun=== {{ko-noun|hangeul=뭐뭐}} # [[X]] (hidden name) #: 김'''XX''' 씨. #:: Mr. Kim X. ====Synonyms==== * {{l|ko|OO}}
